website_summaries.verdict: The overall best set for those looking for a solid assortment to really dive into mixing their own essential oil blends.
pros: 18 oils in all (all in 10 milliliter bottles) that include staples like lavender and eucalyptus, as well as more exotic offerings such as turmeric and copaiba balsam
Features a small booklet to walk you through usage ideas
cons: Some buyers had issues with the droppers pouring rather than dripping the oils

customer_reviews.title: Love the extra information on the bottle
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful essential oils. Smell great. Some essential oil packs I have gotten smell off. These do not. I love the fact that they have extra information about the essential oil on the bottle like the extraction method, part of the plant it came from, the exact name of the essential oil such as Eucalyptus Globus verses Radiata, what it blends well with, and where the aroma note comes from. Very interesting and you can tell they know their stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian V.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING OILS!!!
customer_reviews.text: my daughter's have the symptoms of the flu which my son was diagnosed with on Monday night at the local E.R. My oils came on Tuesday and they smell AMAZING!!! My girls put some peppermint under their noses and on their clothes and pillows and they said they can breath immediately!! They also put lavender on their pressure points to ease their headaches. Just sniffing the oils is AWESOME!! They came in such a pretty box and the booklet that came with it is just so informative!! I have told several people about purchasing these oils. The colors on the bottles are very appeasing to the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling oils at a fair price and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because my wife loves putting them into her oil diffuser. The packaging is excellent and the oils all seem good. I have quickly become the sole operator of the oil diffuser in my pursuit of different blends. There was a double of one scent and another one was missing so I emailed their support and asked if they would just send me the single missing oil and they quickly responded, apologized and sent an entire replacement set of oils. I am very happy with the oils and the manufacturer for their very generous response. I will order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better. But I wanted to at least give it a try considering that they promised GC/MS reports and so many other positive reviews. Some of the oils have very little odor, some have very unpleasant chemical profile. I got a headache just from quickly sniffing a few bottles. I will give props tho that my money was returned upon complaint. Also... when I went to the website and checked their Contact Us page, the address listed was for CHINA! Very shifty.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite oil purchase EVER!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is beautiful! They even included a little book with information about the oils and oil recipes. Also included a free Ebook with over 200 oil recipes, but when I went to the site you can actually get several pdf oil books. Did have one oil leak a little during shipping but the books more than made up for that. My only complaint is I stayed up to late reading all their oil books, lol. Thank you and I will definitely be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Frost Shaker

customer_reviews.title: Great value for pure essential oils
customer_reviews.text: Great value for pure essential oils. Amazing oils and excellent customer service!!!! I use and recommend these oils.
customer_reviews.author: Iknowur4me

customer_reviews.title: This is a genuinely superb product, plus free booklet
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. Great quality...awesome price ! I use them for all things, medicinal purposes, spiritual purposes, I used them in an aroma vaporizer that there is alot to choose from Amazon. I love the Essential sweet Orange, Lemon, Pepperment, Cinnamon and Cedar that I use in my vaporizer I have going 24/7. What I love about Nirvana company is that they even send you a complimentary booklet with all the health benefits for each oil. Knowledge is power. Become a healer today ! Great oils.
customer_reviews.author: karen vanbrocklin

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these oils
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these oils! I received my order of these oils 2 weeks ago, & I couldn't wait to try them. I admit I was a bit skeptical at first, but I am a believer now! I really think I am sleeping better at night. Am feeling more energetic , more rested, & my mood even seems to have improved! I have a diffuser in every room in my home now! Love all the different recipes in your book, have tried several. Haven't tried a scent that I don't like. We also burn wood in my home which makes for very dry air. The mist from my diffusers/humidifier definitely helps! They also smell amazing!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sue W

customer_reviews.title: Great quality oils
customer_reviews.text: I use many of these oils to help rid my body of the many toxins we all induce daily. I use orange and peppermint in my office to keep me energized throughout the day and over the past week while I've had bronchitis I've used eucalyptus, tea tree, and lavender to help me breathe better and get a good night's sleep. Thank you for the good quality oils they're excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: You will love these oils, the recipes that accompanies them and most importantly the quality you get will fit your budget!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these oil’s and would definitely purchase them again. Mixing the lavender and Bergamont in my nightstand diffuser has really helped with my insomnia. Mixing turmeric, peppermint, tea tree and frankincense with sweet almond oil helped ease my chronic back pain. I also put a few drops in my bath to ease muscle pain. Knowing what I’m putting on my body vs unknown chemicals found in muscle rubs is very important to me. I’ve made bath bombs, sugar scrubs and lotions for gifts using yang ylang and the citrus scents and my friends loved them! The price fits my limited budget and it’s the only company that offers a free book with 200 recipes, what’s not to like?!!
customer_reviews.author: tim ouradnik

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't advise purchasing this product. It's cheap, but it's $40 wasted. I was told that there is no way you can get essential oil for that cheap because it's costly to make essential oil. And I guess that's correct. The box and package is beautiful. But that's the only good thing about those oil. The smell is weak or not right. I am comparing several different brand, and those oils do not last and they are weak. I think "you get what you paid for" certainly apply to this product. Also the dropper doesn't work. The oil came out like water. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NTC

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the assortment of essential oils
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the assortment of essential oils! The price was very reasonable. I have used them for headache relief, bath-salts, body wash, soap, and lotions. Looking forward to sharing my homemade essential oil items with family and friends this Christmas. I am sure they will love them as much as I do! Update: My family still loves these essential oils. We have made many Christmas gifts (sprays, soap, lotion, bath salts and deodorant) with these essential oils and they are a big hit!! The different scents are amazing and pair very well with each other.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews, the oils seemed decent. But after i purchsed them and they came in, i was very disappointed with my purchase... The box that they came in was nice but the smell of the oils was disgusting and made my head hurt. They smelled like they were mixed with water. I really regret buying them.
customer_reviews.author: tyev

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stars- No returns allowed
customer_reviews.text: Be careful. These oils smell like chemicals and crude oil. The 1st use yesterday gave us all a massive headache. Gross and no returns allowed. UPDATE: They gave me a full refund despite the no returns allowed policy.
customer_reviews.author: Livin' Large

customer_reviews.title: Oils spilled
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my oils since this is my FIRST time buying them and making me some body butters. Everything else I ordered came perfectly packaged. When I took the plastic off the box I got a very strong aroma. After opening the box I noticed some oils were spilled. After going through them 3 of the 18 oils were spilled out. Now I'm even more upset that I have to return them because its putting a stop to my goals im trying to meet. Very disappointed now I have to wait another week for product. Should have listened to the reviews 😵 pictures added
customer_reviews.author: Asia Reneau

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I usually love these oils. This is the first time I’ve bought this large set and something is off. All the oils smell off like they have a licorice smell that is very nauseating. They all smell pretty similar in the bottle and then hardly diffuse in my diffuser. I guess I got a bad batch but I won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Codyjh

customer_reviews.title: Oils come out way too quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have really tried to love this product, but I just can't make it work. It's an amazing value and seems high quality, but unfortunately, the oil just pours out of the containers. This makes it impossible to get the correct amount in the diffuser or any products I'm making. I can't blend oils because it's impossible to get the right ratio of drops, so I end up having to pour a lot down the drain. On the plus side, my sink smells lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Quantity over quality, but still nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent price for so many oils, but I find it takes about 30 drops minimum to add scent to the body products I make...whereas with other premium oils I've used it takes about half that amount. That being said, it's a wonderful variety of oils and they smell beautiful straight from the bottle. These would be more useful for a diffuser rather than being an ingredient in body products, or a wonderful, decently priced starter kit for somebody. Not the best bang for my buck, unfortunately, given the fact that I have to use so much of each oil to have the scent come through more than just a hint.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Horrible , nauseating smells.  Looks like food coloring was added, signs of dilution
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered many essential oils over the years. These were horrible smelling and weak scented. Which are signs of dilution. Also, some of the scents ( tangerine, orange) looked like they had food dye added, they were bright and deep orange colored. Oils may have a slight tight of color, but these were vivid orange.Plus they dissolved into the water in my mist diffuser. Thats not supposed to happen, "oil and water don't mix"! Also, some of the scents outright smelled horrible and were nauseating ( lavender, basil, cedar).
customer_reviews.author: jeep4x4x4

customer_reviews.title: Smells are too strong!! Waste of money!! Trashing it!!
customer_reviews.text: Ended up not liking this product at all!! I knew it seemed to cheap. The scents are way to strong and most smell nothing like what the bottle says they are. Throwing the rest in the the trash and ordering the “ Cliganic” Essential oil set again. I’m sticking to it!! It’s an organic brand and doesn’t bother me or anyone else in the family!! The smell is heavenly!!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Pierre Mickael

customer_reviews.title: Avoid these oils all 18 smell the same
customer_reviews.text: I just received my pack of natrogix essential oils and the first thing I noticed was the strong aroma from the box and most of the bottles appear sticky. I think something leaked and then dried. I also did not get a sweet orange essential oil. Instead I got 2 atlas cedarwood. This is most likely a mistake by quality assurance. All 18 oils smell the same with just a hint of the scent they are suppose to smell like. I will be returning this package and advise you to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: They are probably great- but mine were leaking
customer_reviews.text: I - as every essential oil lover- got TOO excited when this arrived. The box- BEAUTIFUL. But...I already smelt a strong..strong smell.. you know the one when too many essential oils leaked together and you're kind of like....eeeek no thanks. I opened- and on the lid you could see where one was leaking- you could also smell another...fruity smell. I tried to figure it out but couldn't. They all smelt like they had the other essential oil allll over them. So maybe they smell great- but this was like a strong earthy smell so it made everything else smell..not like it should. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Lovely essential oils and a great company
customer_reviews.text: The scents are true, nothing artificial. I suffer from anxiety and arthritis pain. The recipes in the QuickStart Guide are extremely helpful for both conditions. The others I am currently exploring. I love them! An additional note: one of the oils leaked in transit, even though neither the seal nor the cap on the bottle was broken. I contacted the company, not really expecting a positive response, but I was more than pleasantly surprised. They reached out to me within 24 hours and, after I provided the information they requested, are sending a replacement bottle within the week. Not many companies stand so firmly behind their products. I will definitely purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Harris

customer_reviews.title: Does not seem pure
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get these oils. I have used a couple other brands, but wanted a more comprehensive set. Some of the scents/bottles are great, but others aren't. The orifice reducers are different in each bottle which makes it extremely difficult to add the correct amount of oil. Also, some of the smells seem completely off. While I am still using a couple of these, I am on the market for replacement of quite a few.
customer_reviews.author: New runner

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY BELIEVE THE REVIEWS THEY WILL LEAK EVERYWHERE THE WORST THING I HAVE BOUGHT FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and for some reason thought I would have better luck or that the company would have fixed the issue that so many others had had. I was wrong. They leaked its so awful. The little caps are all defective.
customer_reviews.author: Carl & Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Smells divine!
customer_reviews.text: This box is a beautiful presentation and would make a wonderful gift for anyone. I love blending the oils to create my own scents. I can’t wait to find out about all the medicinal uses for these essential oils as well. I do recommend this as a gift for yourself or a loved one. Wonderful fragrances and the packaging is just gorgeous! I don’t have a condition that I specifically bought the oils for. I just wanted to have a fragrance in the air. Now I am looking forward to using the oils for various wellness aids as soon as my broken shoulder heals.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality oils
customer_reviews.text: I've used the lavender and the frankincense....they are great quality! I have purchased many essential oils, these are by far a great blend! Only a little bit is needed when using these oils. The lavender helps me to fall asleep quickly, I also spray it on my kids pillows at bedtime. They are all sleeping soundly through the night. And are waking up feeling refreshed! The frankincense I use on my bracelet and in my office diffuser. It helps me concentrate and to deal with every day pressures/stresses of owning a business.
customer_reviews.author: Darnet

customer_reviews.title: disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these. When they arrived the bottles were not sealed and leaking into the box. The seals on all the bottles were broken. The oils are obviously watered down. You turn them over and 3-4 drops comes out quickly...never had that happen with any other oils I have had in the past. I am not sure if it a specific seller or what the deal is...but I think I got the "bad" batch from whomever. I won't be ordering again...rather spend 10$ more dollars and get the real deal....disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: eLBee

customer_reviews.title: This is a genuine oils.  Not fakes at all.
customer_reviews.text: I have really been disillusioned over all of the various oil companies sending out fake oils using carrier oils to think out the oils. They all smelled like medicine. Anyway, this oil is really refreshing, smells good... no carrier oils. I use this oils in my CPAP machine to help me sleep and for pain control. It really works. Also, I have issues with my sinuses getting clogged up. And a bit of Eucalyptus oil and I sleep really nice. just don't use too much... or you will have to start over.
customer_reviews.author: Leslieallen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but an oil was missing
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the oils and amount you get however I received a completely empty sweet orange oil. It did not spill and was sealed shut with no scent at all upon opening. I hope they see this and send it because I feel for the price I paid I should get all 18 oils - update I never received the missing oil . very upsetting because I emailed back and forth with their customer service for days after finally being told I’ll receive the missing oil and never heard back or received anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but bottles leak
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to essential oils and thought this was a nice set to start with. This is a lovely set, great presentation and variety. Unfortunately one of my bottles leaked so much you could smell it from outside the box. So I’m down an oil. :( Edit: Natrogix contacted me after submitting a review. They were friendly and wanted to make sure I was satisfied with their product. They sent me a replacement set and I’m happy to say that the bottles did not leak this time. I like the oils I’ve tried so far. I definitely recommend buying their products. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Helene Duysings

customer_reviews.title: Awesome-sauce!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to explore new scents and bought these for myself rather than buy a whole bunch of big bottles I may or may not like. Other brands are waaaay overrated and overpriced. The packaging and bottles are really pretty so this would make a lovely gift, but also nice to treat oneself. So far I've tried about 4 of the bottles in a diffuser - all great and true to scent. Would definitely buy this product and/or brand again, and would definitely give as a gift too. Excellent price for a really good spread of popular oils.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: NATROGIX far exceeded my expectations. They've made a loyal customer out of me! 💯
customer_reviews.text: As a Licensed Massage Therapist, I had utilized and experienced with numerous essential oils until I found one that not only fulfilled my every need, but my clients as well. Unfortunately, they were a local company and I moved 1500 miles away for a much better employment opportunity. My supplies eventually dwindled out so the search was on again. Didn't believe that I'd find anything that could compete with my previous brand, but was I ever wrong. NATROGIX not only far surpassed my wildest expectations... I found that NATROGIX was far superior while being much less expensive. Thank you so much NATROGIX, but please add rose essential oil to your inventory.
customer_reviews.author: Mase

customer_reviews.title: Overall very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Took longer than promised to get here. And when I got it half the oils leaked out in the box. I could smell it before I even opened it. When you go to drop the oils in your diffuser (or anything really) the drops come out so fast it’s almost a stream. Lavender is a pretty common smell that most people can recognize. The lavender in my package smells terrible, I don’t think it’s actually lavender. Overall very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I got these to begin my journey with essential oils, and I am not content with my purchase. Even the lavender smells nothing close to what it should. Directions say I can put a few drops in the bath with me, but they burn my skin. And I only put three drops in a full tub of water. Just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensative skin and they do not burn!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed by these oils. I have very sensitive skin. I have used oils in the past that have burned my skin, even my temples. I was nervous about purchasing oils again, but saw the great reviews on Natrogix oils and thought I would try them. I am so glad I did, they do not burn my skin or my temples. They smell so good and they are not overpowering. I also use them in my diffuser. I am very please with this brand and will continue to purchase these. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Leon

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of different oils! The box that they came in is beautifully designed! It also even comes with a free mini book that tells you what each different oil is good for. They also have an ebook with a bunch of other nice recipes I’m experimenting with. I suggest starting off with 9-12 drops for a 300 ml diffuser and going up if you feel the scent is not strong enough. Keep in mind that this would vary with the room sizes you are trying to cover. These oils can also be used topically, which I haven’t tried yet.
customer_reviews.author: Branda

customer_reviews.title: Quality Essential Oils
customer_reviews.text: I have been using doTerra essential oils for a while now, but they are just SO expensive! Especially for diffusing :( I decided to give Natrogix a try and, yay, they are great! I primarily use the oils for diffusing and so far, so good! The oils smell wonderful and diffuse nicely. I haven't tried them topically mixed with a carrier oil yet, so I will update this review once I do that. I did have some issues claiming my free gift and accessing the free Ebook that they offer, but after an email to the customer support team, that was quickly remedied. Thanks Natrogix, I look forward to purchasing oils from you again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Currie

customer_reviews.title: Would’ve given Zero stars
customer_reviews.text: NOT happy. The oils hardly smell. Immediately after dropping one or two droplets on the palm, the scent dissipates in a matter of seconds. Highly, HIGHLY unsatisfied as I was promised strong smelling, pure oils. I’ve put tangerine, basil and peppermint in my essential oil diffuser and the scent hardly lasts maybe five minutes. Super upset about the whole thing. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service! When my set arrived, there was a strong odor and some of the bottles were sticky (though none were broken or open). I contacted customer service and Maxcom the rep was excellent. They sent a replacement out right away. Replacement was perfect. The box is lovely. Beautiful gift, and can make beautiful gifts- bath teas, blends. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wheezy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUYS THESE !!!
customer_reviews.text: So I read all the reviews... There are a couple bad ones but a lot of good ones so I purchased this. I regret it so much they stink they are not 100% pure. They smell off like chemicals. Tea Tree is one of the worse.. they’ve giving me horrible head aches & made me Nauseous
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I wont purchase this product again
customer_reviews.text: First off I knew the products were leaking when they arrived as you could smell them outside the box. I was right and almost all had leaked, the little book that came with the oils was saturated. While some of the oils smelled ok (the cinnamon leaf) the others were not so pleasant. Since I can not return and cant be refunded thought I should give everyone the heads up
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I want to start out that this product came quickly and it a really pretty box/package. As I opened it up and checked out each oil and scent, I started to get nauseous and my head started to hurt. Sweet orange was the only scent remotely close to what it should smell like. All other scents were unreconizable and smelled horrible. I will be returning the product. Update: I just wanted to say that I increased the stars from my original post because the customer service is outstanding. I may not have liked the product but customer service like that is rare these days.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy & Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great variety and the smell is very relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I just received this less then a day ago, and I already enjoy the relaxing aromas. I used the lavender to help sleep last night. Worked wonders! I’m on my 3rd scent now and am happy so far. Can’t wait to try out every scent to find my favorite blend. Glad I read the comments to help my pick the perfect brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: It's a steal !
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this last month it was $29.9. I enjoyed the pack and started using these essential oils on my aureole cold air diffuser which does not require water or heat. The outcome was perfect and I tried to blend these oils together to give a stronger aroma scent as well as healing effect. I personally prefer the citrus/woody scents (lemongrass/lemon/orange, bergamot/ylang ylang, cypress) which give a relaxing, vital and calm mood. Unfortunately Natrogix does not sell cypress and I have to get it from Eden Gardens.
customer_reviews.author: ibuythings

customer_reviews.title: Bottle Leaking
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this package so I can’t really say how the oils are as of yet, but upon opening I smelt cinnamon and noticed that the cinnamon leaf oil had leaked quite a bit about a fourth of the bottle, the packaging was pretty oily on the inside as well as seeped through a bit. It was a bit of a bummer but aside from that I am pretty excited to try the oils out. The box they came in looked beautiful but the oils seem a little loose in the box itself, maybe something padding the bottles in some way would have protected them better.
customer_reviews.author: jenned

customer_reviews.title: Get these!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! First of all, these essential oils are packaged in a beautiful box. I usually remove my oils from their holding boxes because they are typically not very pleasing to look at. Not the case with this. You can leave the holding box on the coffee table and it’ll look classy. As for the oils themselves, the scent they produce in my diffuser and in my body scrubs is strong, pleasant, but not overwhelming. The scent lingers well. I’d highly recommend these for any space!
customer_reviews.author: Paola V.S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I think the packaging of this product is pretty and some of the oils smell amazing but the majority of them do not smell right. The Ylang Ylang smells awful. I have used oils in the past from Young Living and other reputable sources and they smell completely different from these. I know I get what I pay for but I had hoped that these would be better considering they are supposed to be 100% pure.
customer_reviews.author: SarahLee

customer_reviews.title: Items arrived leaking
customer_reviews.text: If they weren't leaking I would definitely say it was giftable, but the oil seeped through the inner box, which is pretty, all the packing materials and the outer Amazon box. As a result two bottles were over half empty and a third bottle was almost half empty. Eucalyptus scent is very weak, but some of the others are good. I would most likely try another brand/vendor before trying here again.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanySuzann

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful packaging - horrible misrepresentation. These are not pure essential oils. The strong chemical smell others have mentioned is not from high purity levels but definitely additives. It smells like something you would use to start a fire. The lavender oil made me dizzy, nauseous and gave me a horrible headache. Whatever is in it is not for human use. I use strong, pure lavender oil daily. I really wanted to like this set. It’s garbage in a pretty package.
customer_reviews.author: Eden Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Best Oils Out There!
customer_reviews.text: The oils came in perfect shape and I could smell them before I even opened them. I love the look of them and they all smell amazing. I got the 18 set and they all came with no doubles. The only complaint, if I had one, would be some oils I have to shake around a bunch to get oil to come out. Though I’m never in a rush when I use my oils so it’s not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Matelita Fender

customer_reviews.title: Good? Great?
customer_reviews.text: I mean, I am not into essential oils but my girlfriend is...cold? headache? what the heck ever, there's an oil for that...so from what I know the good ones are pretty expensive. Well, for a few small jars of smelly juices, I thought these were pretty pricey, but apparently not...anyway...after reading the reviews I decided on these and well, she was very happy so I guess that means they are pretty good. So really this review is for people like me who have no idea about this stuff but want to make their lady happy...these are a good set...
customer_reviews.author: Jaime W

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit, but I'll be looking for a bottle with a dropper next time.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived full, unbroken and without any leakage. They are the real deal with strong smells. However, I am not a fan of the dripper top, it gets messy and isn't easy to get to drip without coming out too fast or too slow. I'd much prefer bottles with built in droppers. My other issue is the bottles are so tightly packed, it's a PITA to take just one out if you intend to store them in the box (no finger room to grab from the sides, no space between bottles to easily pick it out with a fingernail, no tabs to pull them up). As for the oils, they are real essential oils and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Bottles aren't great, but the oils are nice!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner, so I don't know exactly how each oil should ideally smell or if they're good quality, but I like them so far! I've tried some different blends and I've enjoyed them. However, it's very very hard to follow the exact recipe for a blend because the bottles are terrible! It lets why too many drops out! I literally just tried to get one drop of orange and it ended up giving me 5 or 6! And I don't want to just waste it! But other than that, I like this set, the price is great, and I'd buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice oils, but one leaked everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I really like these oils, as they are all 100% essential oils for a very reasonable price. However, during shipping the spearmint oil leaked. It is hard to tell in the picture, but the spearmint oil is on the left and is only half full as compared to the orange oil on the right. You can also see where it leaked on the quick start guide that came with the set. I think the set would have been nicer if they were packaged better - they were not closed tightly enough and they were laid on their side in the box, which makes storing them in their packaging more cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: A basic review
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it in everything that I want to so therefore I don’t have an educated comment at the moment. I will say that the few that I have used I have enjoyed. I will be using these oils specifically and lotions and selves that I will be making. I wish that chamomile was part of the pack because unfortunately I have to wait for that in order to use it in its intended purpose. I did make a pillow spray and it is absolutely delightful
customer_reviews.author: jessica ausec

customer_reviews.title: By far the best
customer_reviews.text: I used a variety of different essential oils but the fragrance of your oils are by far the best. I love the variety you have also. You are a one shop for all. Thank you. I use them for my sleep disorder and with them I fell right to sleep. My son has autism with anxiety so during the day I use my diffuser and your oils to keep his mind focused on school and staying calm. Thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: Nirvana oils
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my defuser, wanting something of quality which would provide a good scent without using a lot of oil like some of the cheaper oils and it does. I can't complain, I can smell them and the booklet is nice. Presentation is lovely. Nothing leaked in shipping. It's all good, the only issue I've had is that some bottles don't want to release a drop without a good shake and others release a lot of drops in rapid succession with no shaking so it's something to be careful of when using them.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: Ok product!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: The oils came with a card that read “receive free bliss” if you go on to their website to fill out a form and do an amazon review. It’s been months and I’ve not heard a single thing from the company. Still waiting for the freebie that was promised or at least an email saying sorry we ran out. I’m slowly working through the oils now and they are just ok. Will update as I try more oils. Initial review :Beautiful packaging and very quality products. Everything came intact and looks very promising! Quality essential oils. Cute packaging. Oils are potent and legit. I would definitely purchase more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great set of quality essential oils at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality essential oils and I love the variety in this set. It was one of the only sets I saw that included turmeric essential oil. I created a tincture of oils from this set for an abcess tooth and it cured the infection so they clearly hold their healing properties and they smell excellent. It's a great set for someone just getting started with essential oils or someone who wants to beef up an existing collection. This would make a great gift as well. There's just no need to spend an arm and a leg on essential oils. I'm so glad I decided to go with Natrogix Essential Oils!
customer_reviews.author: loretta gentle

customer_reviews.title: Not so good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great, very nice presentacion and the difuser + oils pack is great for a gift. Unfortunately the scent is extremely subtle, almost non perceptible, I tried with 3 drops as the manual says but didn't feel anything so I increased to 10 drops, at the beginning you can feel the smell but after 10 minutes its gone. I have used other essential oil brands like doterra and this doesn't happen. I know that this is much convenient price but I really was expecting something better.
customer_reviews.author: sara sierra tobon

customer_reviews.title: New Year's Resolution: Stress Free
customer_reviews.text: My new year's resolution was to invest in my health. After reading the reviews and comparing prices on Amazon.com, I purchased the Natrogix essential oils. The box containing the oils arrived in good condition. I like that the box has a quick start guide. So, far I am very satisfied with the Natrogix essential oils. Since my bedroom is a small room, my diffuser requires only a few drops to fill the air with an amazing aroma. I have been able to sleep better at night with the lavender essential oil and be more relaxed with the frankincense and bergamot mix.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Quality products
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using essential oils and these did not disappoint. I wanted to start with a large set to discover which ones appealed to me. So far, I have only tried 4 and enjoy them all. I was having trouble downloading the free ebook offered for oil blending so I entered the website chat for assistance. A very nice lady named Leah helped me and sent me the file. I couldn't ask for any better customer service. I highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Deb B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these sets as gifts. The shipment came quickly, and the packaging is delightful. When giving as a gift, the presentation makes a big difference. The oils themselves smell really good and the variety is awesome. All of the bottles in the first of the boxes was in perfect condition, but the second box had a few bottles that had leaked, even though the caps had not been open. Contacting customer service was easy, and Christian, the person I worked with, was very apologetic, very helpful and really wanted to make sure that everything was resolved to my satisfaction. Great product, great packaging and presentation and great customer service. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T L

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new essential oils. I recently moved and lost my mainstay oils (peppermint and lavender) so I was looking for a set that included those plus some of the others I didn't have. I couldn't be more pleased with this set. I've tried several blends and they smell incredible! None of mine arrived damaged and they seem to be of excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Maher

customer_reviews.title: Do not seem to be pure.
customer_reviews.text: These oils were a big disappointment. When I diffused them I felt dizzy and there was a chemical smell to me. My dog would sneeze and leave the room. To be fair, I have many allergies and these seemed to smell really good until I diffused them. Maybe they would be ok for soap making as the price was good. I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Partner two

customer_reviews.title: smell good but packaging no good. 5 failed paper test
customer_reviews.text: These little buggers smell excellent! a little watery than the other brand i am used to but scent is good, only issue i had was 3 of the bottles leaked a bit during packaging and 2 of them were my favorite scents Edited: 3 bottles leaked, seller reached out to me and wanted a pic of packaging i threw out because it had the spilt oil over it..i ended up doing some research and paper or blotter tested these, the cedar atlaswood, ylang ylang, tumeric, copaiba, and cinnamon leaf all left oil residue on the paper after 24 hours of drying..from what i have read this means they are mixed with different oils to extend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Wow!! Great Set of Oils
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect set of 18 oils that can be used in so many ways. When I opened my mailbox, I could smell the oils. It was amazing but then I worried the bottles were broken. They weren't, they were sealed and in perfect condition. Elegant packaging that could be used for gifting. The variety is great. There is a quick start guide that will help with usage. Try them, you will love all the benefits too.
customer_reviews.author: Noni

customer_reviews.title: Leaking stink fest
customer_reviews.text: Soooo I should have trusted the other negative reviews. The package came REEKING of anise (weird) with leaking oil that I figure was a combo of basil and cinnamon (see photos). I threw in a photo of lemon for reference. There was a substantial amount gone from both the basil and cinnamon which seems to be a trend because everyone says these oils show up stinking like licorice... seal the basil and cinnamon better. How hard is that???
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Nasty Chemical Smell
customer_reviews.text: The oils reek of an organic solvent similar to gasoline, in fact several of the oils smell so strongly like this that you can barely discern the scent of the oil itself. I have seen several reviews of the same issue and I can only say that their quality control must be terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing at great price
customer_reviews.text: I have a diffuser and am almost out of my essential oils for it. I came across this brand and they were priced really well so I figured I would give them a try. I’m too impatient to wait to smell them when I use them so I opened them all up. They all smell really good. I used the peppermint and lavender together today and it worked just as well as the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not happy anymore
customer_reviews.text: They were great the first time I purchased this set which is why my daughter took it home with her. So I repurchased it for myself because I was enjoying it so much. this time the first three bottles I picked up no longer had the seal in tact (have not gotten to the others yet). I think it means it was an 'open box' sold as 'new'. That is the nicest thought. The other possibilities include possible diluting or doctoring of contents.
customer_reviews.author: btrtap

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! I’ve read up a lot on ones to mix and using them in different ways and so far so good! In a book I have there is a “holiday mix” it’s sweet orange, lavender and cinnamon leaf mixed and diffusing that in the house this time of year is amazing! Really love essential oils and all their benefits. For beginners it’s easy just read up a lot of what to mix if you want to make mixes if not all of them can be diffused as singles for whatever particular thing your looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very unhappy with my oils. I've never smelled ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very unhappy with my oils. I've never smelled ylang ylang that stunk before. Most of them don't even have a smell. I gave them as a gift and I wish I could return them but I'm outside the window. There's no way these are pure. They're uselessly! My review would be minus 100 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased Young Living and DoTERRA essential oils. I decided to try natrogix oils after reading all the great reviews. I’ve been very pleased with the quality and affordability of these oils! I diffuse Lavender, Lemon & Peppermint daily for allergies. Diffusing Cedarwood, Lavender & Roman Chamomile at bedtime lead to restful sleep. I use EO’s in multiple ways every day!
customer_reviews.author: duckngin

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like it, but...
customer_reviews.text: ****Edit: the company has since contacted me on 7/17/18 and offered a refund or replacement. I chose to go with the refund, but they were very professional and quick about the refund once they found out I had an issue. Changed my rating from 1 star to 3 stars due to the way the company handled the issue. *** The scents were off and really didn't smell like what they had on there. I have tried lots of different brands and this is the first to make me want to pitch it all away. Plus the package I had had 2 leak and that's all you can smell.
customer_reviews.author: BGib

customer_reviews.title: Edited review - excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have a good first impression but the company went above and beyond to make it up so I have to give them at least 3 stars. This is a great value for 18 oils - and most of them are the real deal, but even then its a very good deal. Hopefully they will keep their word and improve their product even more. I wouldn't mind paying a bit extra for 18 of the most popular oils if they were all 100% pure essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Ene-Liis teppo

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy The Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly enjoy my Natrogix Essential Oils. However, I have requested by Free Bliss several times and I have never received it. I followed the directions, but I never received a reply nor the product. It's very disappointing, but because I enjoy your fragrances, I will continue to support you, for now. Thank You, Geri Evans geri.evans@att.net
customer_reviews.author: Geri Evans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I am using them for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these essential oils to use as aromatherapy with my family. We are looking towards a more natural approach for things in our household. That being said I had made a couple different purchases of different brands, so that I could see the differences. The Natrogix essential oils are by far my favorite. Between the fragrances of the oils, the effectiveness of why we are using them, and the consistency of the oils (they are not watery like some of the other brands I bought), this is my absolute favorite, and top choice. I will most definitely continue to purchase these oils for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Leddon

customer_reviews.title: They're ok but NO ebook
customer_reviews.text: The essential oils are ok but I was looking forward to getting the ebook so I could mix and match scents BUT when I went to web site to download it says it can't be found. Same for the free item they include a card for in the package. I don't like false promises. Oils are ok, seller not so much.
customer_reviews.author: HClapp

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: These are a waste of money. I opened each one and smelled horrible. Now my house smells like crap. Do not waste your time on these
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I wasn't expecting much of these essential oils because I am so used to buying more expensive ones. I decided to give them a try since I've read so many good reviews from others. And I am very satisfied with these essential oils. I love that I get so many of them at such an affordable price. To me quality is key and these do the job just as well as the other more expensive brand I was buying. I love all the fragrances included. They all smell so good to me. I use them to diffuse at night but you do get a booklet with other uses for them so I will be experimenting with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nilda Lopez

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for your loved ones or your loved self
customer_reviews.text: Great product, you get 18 oils in a very convenient and nicely designed package. Kit also includes a little booklet with description and suggested use for each oil. Oils are of a highest quality on a market, we use them for aromatherapy, massage, yoga, meditation aid, and as air freshner. I believe this is a best value/quality deal within amazon platform. Try mixing ylang ylang with sweet orange for a great sexy vibe, just a few drops of each into your oil burner or diffuser, plus a dash of water. Smells fill the room in seconds and last for a few hours. Great product, thank you Natrogix!
customer_reviews.author: roman empire

customer_reviews.title: Missing bergamot
customer_reviews.text: Great product, however I received two bottles of frankincense and no bergamot in my box! I love frankincense though but would have preferred one of each scent. Otherwise beautiful package, nice presentation, helpful booklet and the quality of the oils is excellent especially given such a low price. Also the oils drip out of the bottle very easily unlike other brands that you must shake the bottle to get the product out. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I am from Texas! And this is a real review.
customer_reviews.text: Alive unboxing. Right away when the package was delivered I knew what it was. Based on the concentrated scent I could smell through the package. The added benefit. Is the book that comes along with it. That tells you exactly what purpose or helpful benefit each oil has. I'm very happy with this product. And the company. I look forward to ordering another one as a gift to give.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect/ update
customer_reviews.text: I love the scents they truly are great. However, some of the bottles leaked while being shipped which is a bummer otherwise this would be perfect.. Update: after opening the rest of the oils and smelling them a lot of them have the same chemical/ artificial scent with the exception of lemon, llang llang and bergamot. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jryan

customer_reviews.title: Not good for soap...
customer_reviews.text: When I buy essential oils I expect the scent to be potent when diluting into other ingredients... these do not... the orange went into soap bars and I used almost HALF THE CONTENTS of the orange bottle and the soap BARELY has a orange scent... really disappointing... gunna have to buy one at a time and get a box to store them in... wont buy again... maybe a gift for my kid to practice with..
customer_reviews.author: Charlsey Oft

customer_reviews.title: Scent-tacular! :)
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of Natrogix Nirvana essential oils (top 18). The oils are very fragrant and the scents last for hours. I love that the set comes with a booklet describing the beneficial uses for each of the oils as well as recipes for blending the oils. I use the oils to ease sinus congestion, to boost or calm my mood, and to help with sleep at night. I will continue to purchase these oils.
customer_reviews.author: Queenpwr

customer_reviews.title: These are a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love... I bought another set of essential oils and they didn’t come close to how potent (and yummy) these oils are. They diffuse beautifully. The only reason I didn’t give a full five star was because one of the bottles was leaking when I opened the plastic wrapped package (not much, still had plenty in the bottle but thought I’d mention it).
customer_reviews.author: Cuqui

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I’m pleasantly surprised. The package came in tact with no spillage. I do have to add the package and labeling is beautiful. I’ve been using essential oils for about 3 years now and am new to this line. I opened each bottle in my kit to smell them and they all seem to be very concentrated. I’ve only used the oils one day- I believe I’ll purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysMyGirls

customer_reviews.title: Good but oil leaked out of bottles
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the box but immediately became concern as I could smell a mixture of scents. Upon opening, I saw the stain mark and knew. My only concern is that 6 of the botles were not properly sealed and leaked out. And it was the ones I truly needed. The manufacturer needs to look at the seal of bottles. Because of that I gave a low rating.
customer_reviews.author: sxmspice

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my oils!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the oils when I ordered a diffuser. Have used them quite often. I have enjoyed using the down loadable book on blending the oils for different scents. One of the bottles did leak during shipping, so my package arrived smelling good! 😀 Would definitely purchase again! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley B.

customer_reviews.title: Great selection!
customer_reviews.text: This set has a great selection of oils! The only thing that’s weird is that I bought the same set to keep at my workplace and some of the same fragrances smell different.. maybe a batch thing? I bought them around the same time.. they don’t smell bad, just different. The set is a great compliment to the basic scents you’ll want to keep replacing e.g. peppermint, tea tree, eucalyptus, lavender. Really nice for a gift and easy to store the oils in here. Love the label colors!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit - excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I am just starting out using essential oils - the quality is great and the booklet that came with the kit provided good basic info. Interesting; animals tend to "choose" their oils - I opened all bottles in the living room and my older cats both chose (came up to) turmeric and copaiba - they have arthritis!!! I put that in a diffuser for them. I use lemongrass for plantar fasciitis- amazing!! I like their suggested blends for the diffuser, too!
customer_reviews.author: Dixie L Dunn

customer_reviews.title: The price seems too good to be true... Because it is
customer_reviews.text: Some of the oils were leaking when I received them. They didn't smell right to me. They seemed like maybe they're watered down or diluted. I also received a double- 2 bottles of copaiba. I guess you get what you pay for. I'm going to stick with Plant Guru and Plant Therapy oils. I returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 3 times now. It was gifted to me for Valentine’s Day, actually, and I used it all with in the month (cleaning, defusing, and cleaning some more) ....dogs, got to love them... I just recently bought the larger bundle and am learning a lot about the new oils included in this package. I highly recommend buying this brand specifically. I have strayed away and went for cheaper options and they ether stink literally or burn your skin. This is the best brand for your dollar. You won’t be disappointed. Tip **the sweet orange and tangerine are great for cleaning*
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Some bottles questionable
customer_reviews.text: Great basic oils, but some of the other scents were horrible. What I did like about each bottle is that they list pairing options with that particular smell. But there are a handful that just don’t work. Three stars for the smells that did work.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for a new user
customer_reviews.text: I have been familiar with essential oils for some time and know friends that have been using them with positive results. I decided that I would like to explore their use in more depth. I ordered the 18 essential oil package (Nirvana) from Natrogix. I couldn't be happier. They came packaged very well and have wonderful aroma and quality. I love the online access to their ebook for reference My husband is sleeping better after I used some essential oils in a diffuser at night in the bedroom. I would recommend these to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S

customer_reviews.title: Great oils for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good oils for a really reasonable price. Packaging could use improvement because my first purchase of these oils could be smelled before opening the shipping carton. One bottle (tea tree oil) was completely empty due to leakage during transit. A quality check to ensure bottles are tightly sealed before shipping and a padded shipping carton would definitely help. I purchased this again a couple days ago and this time my order was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: prakash r.

customer_reviews.title: Superb product and exceptional customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed in an understatement in regards to this product and the company! I recieved my 18-piece kit in its beautiful packaging two days after ordering. Uponing opening the kit the I realized I recieved a duplicate of an oil and in turn was missing an oil from the kit. Normally I would not bother with such an occurrence, but after reading multiple reviews on their superb customer service, and genuinely needing the oil I did not recieve, I reached out the company via their real-time assistant service. In minutes an agent had processed a full replacement for me with no charge or returns! The oils are affordable, stylish, excellent quality and I highly recommend natrogix to all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Natrogix Nirvana Essential Oils - Top 18 Essential Oil Set 100% Pure Therapeutic Grade 18/10ml Incl. (Tea Tree, Lavender, Lemon, Rosemary And 14 More) Made in USA w/Free E-Book
feature_bullets: THERAPEUTIC GRADE ESSENTIAL OIL SET - Natrogix Nirvana is the ultimate essential oils set, holding eighteen (18) painstakingly extracted essential oils. Used alone or combined together in exquisite sensory recipes, these oils breath relaxation, joy and healing into any environment.

THE PERFECT COMBINATION & FREE RECIPE E-BOOK - Natrogix Nirvana contains the 18 most popular essential oils on the planet: Eucalyptus, Frankincense, Lavender, Lemongrass, Lemon, Moroccan Rosemary, Sweet Orange, Tea Tree, Peppermint, Turmeric Oil, Tangerine, Ylang Ylang, Basil, Cedarwood, Spearmint, Bergamot, Copaiba Balsam, Cinnamon Leaf. We've created 200 custom recipes for your Natrogix Nirvana set, and you get the book free with today's purchase.

DELICATE OILS PROTECTED - Cradled inside each enlightened box of Nirvana are eighteen 10ml bottles with easy-use droppers. The gold amber tint of the strong bottles guard these precious, delicate oils against light and UV degradation. All Natrogix oils are bottled in the US.

HIGHEST QUALITY GUARANTEED AND - We are truly proud of Natrogix Nirvana. All 18 oils are GC/MS certified. Please kindly understand smell is NOT everything about essential oils. Their main job is to be absorbed into our system by breathing and through skin absorption, to promote health and wellbeing. Some oils smell "chemical" because of containing 100% natural chemicals form the plant such as alcohols, aldehydes, esters, ketones, etc.
PROFESSIONAL AND FRIENDLY AFTER-SALES SERVICE - We provide the most professional and best service to solve all pre-sale and after-sale problems for customers.
